name: ARK·TPE on Earth
description:
ARK·TPE building is located at No.100, Section 7, Civil Avenue, Nangang District, Taipei City, just at the junction of Songshan, Nangang, and Neihu. It was originally Taipower’s old warehouse, named N24. 

At present, it has officially opened on Christmas Eve, December 24, 2020. and operated by Taiwan Association for Blockchain Ecosystem Innovation (TABEI). 

In order to become the pilot in Taiwan's industry. TABEI is committed to promoting blockchain technology and decentralized applications. In addition to serving as a demonstration and prof of service (POS), TABEI will also hold a series of co-creation workshops gradually formed community settlements, driving the transformations of industries to accelerate the success of entrepreneurship. Some well-known incubation agencies in Taiwan (such as the Institute of Information Technology, Industrial Technology Research Institute, etc.) have been stationed. 

It's worth to mention that a satellite antenna system installed that can receive blockchain information, continuing the decentralized spirit of Cypherpunk, and symbolizing the importance of privacy protection. 

It is expected that the NFTs of water, fire, and wind will be issued accordingly.
